facts.fact: A new endpoint named VirtualChainFromBlockV2 is being developed for the rusty-kaspa codebase.
facts.context: The creation of a new VirtualChainFromBlockV2 endpoint suggests an upgrade or addition to the current API/capabilities related to virtual chain operations in Kaspa node software; however, the pull request is marked as "work in progress" and lacks implementation details at this stage.
